constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 26 (Thursday, February 11, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. BASS:
H.R. 965.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 1 of the United States Constitution,
providing--``All legislative Powers herein granted shall be
vested in a Congress of the United States, which shall
consist of a Senate and House of Representatives.''
[Page H502]

latestAction.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 161.

title: YALI Act of 2021
